fleetSelectionText: Premium fleet selection for every need

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about our car rental services

questions.question: What do I need to rent a car?
questions.answer: To rent a car, you need a valid driver's license, proof of identity, and may need to meet certain age and driving experience requirements.

questions.question: What are the payment and insurance options?
questions.answer: We accept various payment methods, with potential security deposits. Insurance options are available with different levels of coverage.

contactSupport.title: Still have questions?
contactSupport.description: Can't find what you are looking for? Our customer support team is here to help you 24/7.

footer.companyDescription: Your trusted partner for car rentals. Experience premium service with unlimited miles and flexible pick-up options at unbeatable prices.

heroSection.title: What Our Customers Say
heroSection.subtitle: Discover why thousands of customers choose us for their car rental needs and trust us with their travel experiences.

testimonialData.name: Erion Dashi
testimonialData.comment: The best car rental experience I've ever had! The process was seamless from start to finish. The car was immaculate and the customer service was exceptional.

testimonialData.name: Alma Zeneli
testimonialData.comment: Perfect for our family vacation! The SUV was spacious, clean, and well-maintained. The staff was incredibly helpful with car seat installation.

testimonialData.name: Bledar Hoxha
testimonialData.comment: Great service and competitive prices. The pickup and drop-off process was quick and efficient. Will definitely use again!

reviewSection.title: What People Love About Us
reviewSection.subtitle: See what aspects of our service customers appreciate the most

ctaSection.title: Ready to Experience It Yourself?
ctaSection.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers and book your perfect rental car today.
